story_context.player_action: standing at the precipice, the artifact in hand, a choice before them
recent_events: Grandfather's memories merged with player's consciousness
Understood the true cost of the artifact
Rival explorer approached from behind, weapons ready

content.text: The artifact weighed nothing and everything. Behind you, footsteps echoed—the rival, the ally, the temple guardian itself, all converging on this moment. The compass in your pocket spun wildly, pointing not to a direction but to a choice. You could claim the artifact, claim the power, claim your legacy. Or you could set it free, end the cycle, and walk out into the world as just yourself—a person, not a bearer, not a seeker, but free. The temple waited. The world waited. Your heart decided.
